S06n560:1: punaraparaṃ bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma-sacetkauśika ayaṃ te jambūdvīpaḥ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ dīyeta,
S06n560:3: tata ekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ katamaṃ tvaṃ kauśika bhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāḥ?
S06n560:4: śakra āha-sacenme bhagavan ayaṃ jambūdvīpaḥ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ dīyeta,
S06n560:6: tata ekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām |
S06n560:12: mā khalu punarimaṃ bhikṣavaḥ satkāyaṃ kāyaṃ manyadhvam |
S06n560:14: eṣa ca tathāgatakāyo bhūtakoṭiprabhāvito draṣṭavyo yaduta prajñāpāramitā |
S06n560:17: api tu khalu punarbhagavan itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto nirjātāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante |
S06n560:18: tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayaiva prajñāpāramitayā pūjitayā teṣāmapi tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇā pūjā kṛtā bhavati |
S06n560:21: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāmahaṃ yasmin samaye divye svake āsane niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi,
S06n560:24: atha tasmin samaye yanmamāsanaṃ tatra devaputrā mama gauraveṇa tadāsanaṃ namaskṛtya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva prakrāmanti |
S06n560:26: iha hi kila āsane niṣadya śakro devānāmindro devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatīti |
S06n560:32: evameva bhagavan sarvajñajñānahetukā tathāgataśarīreṣu pūjā kṛtā bhavati |
S06n560:33: tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām |
S06n560:36: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvātpūjāṃ labhante |
S06n560:37: tiṣṭhatu khalu punarbhagavan ayaṃ jambūdvīpastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ |
S06n560:40: tiṣṭhatu bhagavan dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ |
S06n560:43: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dvitīyo bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta |
S06n560:44: anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoryaste bhāgo'bhipretastamekaṃ bhāgaṃ gṛhāṇeti,
S06n560:48: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni pūjāṃ labhante |
S06n560:51: tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām |
S06n560:54: api tu khalu punarbhagavan itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto nirjātāni tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante yaduta prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvāt |
S06n560:55: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan anarghaṃ maṇiratnamebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ syāt |
S06n560:57: tatra tatra manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraṃ na labheran |
S06n560:58: yatra yatra vā amanuṣyagṛhītaḥ kaścidbhavet puruṣo vā strī vā,
S06n560:59: tatra tatra tasmin maṇiratne praveśitamātre so'manuṣyastato'pakrāmet |
S06n560:60: vātenāpi bādhyamānasya dhamyamāne śarīre tanmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta |
S06n560:68: śleṣmaṇāpi parigṛddhe sarvato bādhyamāne śarīre sthāpyeta,
S06n560:77: uṣṇe cāpi vartamāne yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe sthāpyeta,
S06n560:79: śīte cāpi vartamāne yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe sthāpyeta,
S06n560:86: sacedbhagavan strī vā puruṣo vā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭo bhavet,
S06n560:88: tasya sahadaṃśanenaiva maṇiratnasya tadviṣaṃ pratihanyeta vigacchet |
S06n560:89: ebhiścānyaiśca bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet |
S06n560:90: yeṣāmapi keṣāṃcidbhagavan akṣiṣvarbudaṃ vā timiraṃ vā akṣirogo vā paṭalaṃ vā bhavet,
S06n560:92: teṣāṃ sthāpitamātreṇaiva te'kṣidoṣā nirghātaṃ praśamaṃ gaccheyuḥ |
S06n560:93: etaiśca anyaiśca bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet |
S06n560:98: evaṃ sacennīlena pītena lohitena māñjiṣṭhena eteṣāmanyeṣāṃ vā nānāprakārāṇāṃ vastrāṇāmanyatamena vastreṇa tanmaṇiratnaṃ veṣṭayitvā vā baddhvā vā udake prakṣipyeta,
S06n560:99: tena tena vastrarāgeṇa tattatsvabhāvavarṇaṃ tadudakaṃ kuryāt |
S06n560:101: ebhirapi bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet ||
S06n560:102: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-kiṃ punaḥ kauśika devaloka eva tāni maṇiratnāni santi,
S06n560:103: uta jāmbūdvīpakānāmapi manuṣyāṇāṃ tāni maṇiratnāni santi?
S06n560:105: api tu khalu punarjāmbudvīpakānāmapi manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni santi |
S06n560:106: tāni tu gurukāṇi alpāni parīttāni guṇavikalāni,
S06n560:108: tatteṣāṃ divyānāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayānti,
S06n560:116: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi aupamyamapi upanisāmapi upaniṣadamapi na kṣamante nopayānti |
S06n560:119: yatra ca karaṇḍake tanmaṇiratnaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavati utkṣiptaṃ vā,
S06n560:120: tata uddhṛte'pi tasmin maṇiratne karaṇḍakāt spṛhaṇīya eva sa karaṇḍako bhavati |
S06n560:122: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā ete guṇāḥ sarvajñajñānasya ca |
S06n560:123: yena parinirvṛtasyāpi tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante-sarvajñajñānasyemāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanabhūtānyabhūvanniti |
S06n560:124: yathā ca bhagavan sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā prajñāpāramitānirjātatvātpūjyā,
S06n560:126: yathā ca bhagavan rājapuruṣo rājānubhāvānmahato janakāyasya akutobhayaḥ pūjyaḥ,
S06n560:127: evaṃ sa dharmabhāṇako dharmakāyānubhāvānmahato janakāyasya akutobhayaḥ pūjyaḥ |
S06n560:128: yathā ca dharmadeśanā dharmabhāṇakāśca pūjāṃ labhante,
S06n560:130: tasmāttarhi bhagavan tiṣṭhatu trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ,
S06n560:132: te'pi sarve tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇāścūlikābaddhā eko bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta,
S06n560:133: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dvitīyo bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta |
S06n560:134: tatra cenmāṃ bhagavan kaścideva pravārayedanyatareṇa bhāgena,
S06n560:135: pravāryamāṇo'nayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ-yaste bhāgo'bhipretaḥ tamekaṃ bhāgaṃ parigṛhṇīṣveti,
S06n560:136: tatra imāmevāhaṃ bhagavaṃstayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorbhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitām |
S06n560:137: na khalu punarbhagavan mama teṣu tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam |
S06n560:139: api tu khalu punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitā sarvajñatā,
S06n560:141: tasmāttarhi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pūjitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjā kṛtā bhavati ||
S06n560:142: punaraparaṃ bhagavan ye'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanta etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06n560:143: tān dharmatayā draṣṭukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
S06n560:147: ye'pi te kauśika abhūvannatīte'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06n560:148: te'pi kauśika imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ |
S06n560:149: ye'pi te kauśika bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06n560:150: te'pi kauśika imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante |
S06n560:151: ye'pi te kauśika etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06n560:152: te'pi kauśika buddhā bhagavantaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ |
S06n560:153: ahamapi kauśika etarhi tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ ||
S06n560:154: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā |
S06n560:155: sarvasattvānāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaścittacaritāni samyak prajānāti saṃpaśyati |
S06n560:157: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06n560:158: tena sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samyak prajānāti saṃpaśyati ||
S06n560:159: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmeva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati nānyāsu pāramitāsu?
S06n560:160: bhagavānāha-sarvāsu kauśika ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati |
S06n560:161: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva atra pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ vā dadataḥ,
S06n560:166: dharmān vā vipaśyataḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitaivātra pūrvaṃgamā |
S06n560:167: na ca kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ viśeṣaḥ,
S06n560:169: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jambudvīpe nānāvṛkṣā nānāvarṇā nānāsaṃsthānā nānāpatrā nānāpuṣpā nānāphalā nānārohapariṇāhasaṃpannāḥ,
S06n560:170: na ca teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ chāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06n560:171: api tu chāyā chāyetyevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
S06n560:172: evameva kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ na viśeṣaḥ,
S06n560:174: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-mahāguṇasamanvāgateyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā |
